item.title: Chrismas Responder
item.dc:creator: @mrrules mrrules
item.description:
@mrrules wrote:

Got bored last night at 1:00 and made this…It’s a Responder so if someone say’s soemthing it will respond back…

[code]program ChrismasResponder;
begin
If(GetChatMessage(‘marry chrismas’)) or (GetChatMessage(‘happy hoildays’)) or (GetChatMessage(‘happy chrismas eve’)) or (GetChatMessage(‘merry chrismas’))
Begin
WriteLn(’’+ChatName+’: '+Chat);
Case RandomReply of
0 : Responce:= (‘marry chrismas’);
1 : Responce:= (‘marry chrismas to u’);
2 : Responce:= (‘marry chrismas to you’);
3 : Responce:= (‘merry chrismas’);
4 : Responce:= (‘marry chrismas too u’);
5 : Responce:= (‘marry chrismas too you’);
6 : Responce:= (‘merry crismas to u’);
7 : Responce:= (‘merry chrismas to you’);
8 : Responce:= (‘merry chrismas too you’);
9 : Responce:= (‘merry chrismas too u’);
10 : Responce:= (‘same’);
11: Responce:= (‘same too you’);
12 : Responce:= (‘same to you’);
13 : Responce:= (‘same to u’);
14 : Responce:= (‘same too u’);
15 : Responce:= (‘you to’);
16 : Responce:= (‘you too’);
17 : Responce:= (‘u to’);
18 : Responce:= (‘u too’);
19 : Responce:= (‘ty’);
20 : Responce:= (‘ty u too’);
21 : Responce:= (‘ty you too’);
22 : Responce:= (‘ty you to’);
23 : Responce:= (‘ty u to’);
24 : Responce:= (‘thank you , u too’);
25 : Responce:= (‘thank you , u to’);
26 : Responce:= (‘thank you too’);
27 : Responce:= (‘thank you , u to’);

End

TypeSend(Responce);
Result:= True;
End

End;
end.[/code]

Made it my self so dont say i riped it from someone else…

Read full topic
